site.title: Brit & Karl — Solstice of '26
site.tagline: A Solstice Weekend at Coeur d'Alene Casino

events.name: Doors Open
events.description: Arrive, grab a drink, find your seat, and say hi before the ceremony.

events.name: Ceremony
events.description: Join us as we get married at the Coeur d'Alene Casino.

events.name: Cocktail Hour
events.description: Cocktails, appetizers, and catching up while we finish photos.

events.name: Dinner
events.description: Dinner is served. Please let us know your meal choice when you RSVP.

events.name: Dancing & Party
events.description: Dancing, drinks, casino runs, and bad decisions encouraged (within reason).

venue.name: Coeur d'Alene Casino Resort Hotel
venue.notes: Full-service resort with hotel, casino, multiple restaurants, and event spaces.

locations.name: Resort Main Entrance
locations.description: Main hotel & casino entrance. Follow signs to the event center or ask the front desk for our wedding.

locations.name: Ceremony Space
locations.description: Our ceremony will be held in an event space at the Casino. Exact room details will be on your itinerary closer to the date.

locations.name: Reception Hall
locations.description: Dinner and dancing will be just a short walk from the ceremony space.

locations.name: Cocktail Hour Area
locations.description: Cocktail hour will be held near the reception space.

hotels.name: Coeur d'Alene Casino Resort Hotel
hotels.notes: This is our main hotel. Please book here if possible so everyone is together.

hotels.name: Nearby Hotels & Motels
hotels.notes: If the resort fills up, there are additional options within a short drive.

airports.name: Spokane International Airport
airports.notes: This is the main airport to use for out-of-town guests.

airports.name: Coeur d'Alene Airport (general aviation)
airports.notes: General aviation only. Use GEG for commercial flights.

driving.fromSpokane: From Spokane, take I-90 east toward Coeur d'Alene, then follow the signs south to the Coeur d'Alene Casino Resort Hotel in Worley, ID.
driving.fromCDA: From Coeur d'Alene, head south on US-95 toward Worley and follow signage to the Casino.
driving.parkingInfo: Parking at the resort is plentiful and free. Follow signs for hotel/event parking.

shuttles.description: We plan to run a shuttle for key events if there is enough interest. Please indicate if you'd like to use a shuttle when you RSVP.

travel.rideshareNotes: Uber and Lyft are available in the area, but allow extra time since this is a resort property.

mealChoices.label: Beef Entrée
mealChoices.description: Steak or roast-style beef entrée with seasonal sides.

mealChoices.label: Chicken Entrée
mealChoices.description: Roasted or grilled chicken with seasonal sides.

mealChoices.label: Vegetarian Entrée
mealChoices.description: A hearty vegetarian option. Please let us know any specific needs.

push.notes: Web push can be added later via service workers.

faq.question: What should I wear?
faq.answer: Dress code is cocktail / mountain chic. Think suits or sport coats, cocktail dresses, jumpsuits, or similar. Please no jeans, shorts, or athletic wear.

faq.question: Are kids invited?
faq.answer: We love your kids, but this will be an adults-focused evening. A small number of family kids will be there; if you have questions about bringing children, please reach out to us directly.

faq.question: Do you have a registry?
faq.answer: Your presence means the most to us. For those who have asked, we'll share a small registry and a honeymoon fund link on this site closer to the date.

faq.question: Can I take photos and post on social media?
faq.answer: We'd love for you to be present during the ceremony, so we're planning for an unplugged ceremony. After that, please take and share photos freely using our hashtag #SolsticeOf26.

faq.question: Can we gamble at the Casino?
faq.answer: Absolutely. Just don't miss the ceremony or the first dance! Please gamble responsibly.

faq.question: What's the best way to get there?
faq.answer: Fly into Spokane International Airport (GEG), rent a car, and drive to the Coeur d'Alene Casino Resort Hotel in Worley, ID. Parking is free on site.

game.name: Solstice Runner
game.description: A little endless runner game in the spirit of the Google T-Rex game. Tap or press space to jump!
